meta.title: Pixel Trapped in Laser Invisible Box

beats.visual: Spotlight snaps on; Pixel pats the air, hits unseen wall.
beats.gag_note: Sound effect of gentle glass ping.

beats.visual: Pixel traces box outline; sparkles mark imaginary edges.
Invisible elevator lever lowers Pixel dramatically.
Pixel pulls invisible rope; imaginary anvil hovers overhead.
Invisible door opens; Pixel smacks into side panel.
Pixel climbs invisible ladder, floating higher with each paw.
Box suddenly shrinks; Pixel's whiskers squish comically.
Invisible confetti rains as Pixel escapes with flourish.
Pixel runs into new wall, shrugs to camera.

tts_line: Pixel keeps finding walls that only exist in mime-land.
style_prompt: cartoon neon glitch cat, pixel shimmer fur, clean bold outlines, flat neon colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, spotlit stage with invisible box mimed by cartoon cat, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
